Lebowski.TextModel.TextEditorTextContext

Lebowski.TextModel.TextEditorTextContext Class Reference

TextBoxTextContext is a text context that is linked with a standard ICSharpCode.TextEditor that supports syntax hightlighting, display of remote selections currently support display of remote selections. More...

Detailed Description

TextBoxTextContext is a text context that is linked with a standard ICSharpCode.TextEditor that supports syntax hightlighting, display of remote selections currently support display of remote selections.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Lebowski.TextModel.TextEditorTextContext.TextEditorTextContext ( TextEditorControl  textBox  ) 

Initializes a new instance of the TextEditorTextContent class. This TextEditorTextContent instance will be linked with a TextEditorControl.

Parameters:
textBox The TextEditorControl to link with.
